ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Permission.NetSuite_Service_User_Permission ), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.Corpweb_SFDC_Robot, $User.X18_Digit_User_ID__c)), SBQQ__Partner__c != null, Blended_Discount__c < Channel_Partner_Discount__c, ISPICKVAL(SBQQ__Status__c,"Approved"), ISCHANGED(SBQQ__Status__c), SBQQ__NetAmount__c > 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Discount on the Quote is less than the approved Partner Discount. Please update the Quote discount
